function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation due to open windows","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Install air purification systems or increase ventilation capacity","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems","People":"Laboratory occupants, students, staff","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Inconsistent temperature and humidity distribution","Impact":"Uncomfortable thermal conditions for students","Mitigation":"Adjust HVAC settings or strategically place heating/cooling devices","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, portable heaters/coolers","People":"Students, staff, facility management","Owner":"Facility management"}]}
